txt.en: Destroy relic-hunting tools at Sharkey's Slough ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Destroyed relic-hunting tools at Sharkey's Slough ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Destroy dredging mechanisms at Sharkey's Slough ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
After discovering a number of dredging machines left in disrepair, Sharkey's Men have hastened their search of the Gladden Fields for lost treasure.

Relic-hunting tools and dredging machine mechanisms can be found at Sharkey's Slough in the centre of the Gladden Fields.\n\nYou have discovered that Sharkey's Men have been using a variety of tools in addition to Saruman's old dredging machines to search for lost relics in the Gladden Fields.
You have done much to hinder the efforts of Sharkey's Men in the Gladden Fields and destroyed the mechanisms of Saruman's dredging machines of old.
Destroyed dredging mechanisms at Sharkey's Slough ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Destroy relic-hunting tools at Sharkey's Slough (0/10)

Amidst the half-orcs and ruffians at Sharkey's Slough, you have discovered a number of destructive tools used by Sharkey's Men to search for lost treasures in the Gladden Fields. Among these tools, you have also noticed several of Saruman's old dredging machines have been partially rebuilt and reinforced to dig deeper into the earth.\n\nYou should hinder the efforts of Sharkey's Men by destroying their tools and dredging mechanisms.
By destroying their tools and damaging Saruman's dredging machines of old beyond repair, you have done much to hinder Sharkey's Men in their efforts to search the Gladden Fields for lost treasures.

Relic-hunting tools and dredging machine mechanisms can be found at Sharkey's Slough in the centre of the Gladden Fields.\n\nYou have discovered that Sharkey's Men have been using a variety of tools in addition to Saruman's old dredging machines to search for lost relics in the Gladden Fields.
